## Description, Proposal
A clear and concise description of the proposed enhancement / feature.

## Reasoning
Why is this change desirable?
Consider aspects including gameplay, lore, localisation, historicity, representation, etc.

## Impact, Benefits, Malefits
Who and what might be affected by this change?
For a more gameplay-focused feature, consider balance, gameplay styles, performance, accessibility, etc.
For a more lore- or history-focused feature, consider historicity, representation, narrative hooks, etc.

## Alternative solutions
Are there any other solutions to this particular issue that could be considered? Brief pros and cons.
Consider the null/no-change solution. Brief pros and cons.

Optional additional comments or media.
